tika-abh09t4:3_0: Puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti (kathā. 1), āmantā. Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:3_1: tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe.
tika-abh09t4:4_0: Ājānāhi niggahaṁ – hañci puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena,
tika-abh09t4:4_1: tena vata re vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:4_3: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:4_5: tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:5_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:5_2: no ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti.
tika-abh09t4:5_3: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:5_5: tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:7_0: Puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Āmantā. Yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:7_1: tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe.
tika-abh09t4:8_0: Ājānāhi paṭikammaṁ – hañci puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena,
tika-abh09t4:8_1: tena vata re vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:8_3: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:8_5: tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:9_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:9_2: no ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti.
tika-abh09t4:9_3: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:9_5: tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:11_0: Tvaṁ ce pana maññasi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:11_3: Tena tava tattha hetāya paṭiññāya hevaṁ paṭijānantaṁ hevaṁ niggahetabbe, atha taṁ niggaṇhāma, suniggahito ca hosi –
tika-abh09t4:12_1: tena vata re vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:12_3: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:12_5: tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:13_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:13_2: no ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti.
tika-abh09t4:13_3: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:13_5: tato so puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, idaṁ te micchā.
tika-abh09t4:15_0: Ese ce dunniggahite hevamevaṁ tattha dakkha,
tika-abh09t4:15_4: no ca mayaṁ tayā tattha hetāya paṭiññāya hevaṁ paṭijānantā hevaṁ niggahetabbā, atha maṁ niggaṇhāsi, dunniggahitā ca homa –
tika-abh09t4:16_1: tena vata re vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:16_3: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:16_5: tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:17_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:17_2: no ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti,
tika-abh09t4:17_3: yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:17_5: tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, idaṁ te micchā.
tika-abh09t4:19_1: tena hi yaṁ niggaṇhāsi – hañci puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena,
tika-abh09t4:19_2: tena vata re vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:19_4: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:19_6: tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti, micchā.
tika-abh09t4:20_0: No ce pana vattabbe ‘‘yo saccikaṭṭho paramattho,
tika-abh09t4:20_2: no ca vata re vattabbe ‘‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’ti.
tika-abh09t4:20_3: Yaṁ tattha vadesi ‘‘vattabbe kho ‘puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena’,
tika-abh09t4:20_5: tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā’’’ti , idaṁ te micchā. Tena hi ye kate niggahe, se niggahe dukkaṭe. Sukate paṭikamme. Sukatā paṭipādanāti.
